attributes.name: Absinthe style
attributes.description: Defines the style of absinthe, e.g. mixed, distilled

attributes.name: Absinthe variety
attributes.description: Differentiates absinthe products by their unique varieties, e.g. rouge, verte

attributes.name: Bakery items included
attributes.description: Identifies the types of bakery goods included, e.g. bagel, scone

attributes.name: Baking purpose
attributes.description: Defines what type of baked goods a product is used for, e.g. cookies, muffins

attributes.name: Base spirit
attributes.description: Defines the primary alcohol used in a product, such as whiskey or rum

attributes.name: Beer variety
attributes.description: Classifies beers based on their specific type or style, e.g. stout, pilsner

attributes.name: Beverage product form
attributes.description: Describes how the beverage is presented or consumed, such as ready-to-drink or capsules

attributes.name: Bitter variety
attributes.description: Classifies bitters based on their flavor profiles, e.g. floral, spicy

attributes.name: Brandy variety
attributes.description: Distinguishes between different brandy styles, e.g. cognac, grappa

attributes.name: Canned meat variety
attributes.description: Distinguishes between varieties of canned meats, such as turkey or ham

attributes.name: Chocolate type
attributes.description: Defines the variety of chocolate based on its ingredients and cocoa content, e.g. dark chocolate, milk chocolate

attributes.name: Cigar body
attributes.description: Indicates the strength and taste profile of cigars, e.g. mild, medium to full

attributes.name: Coffee creamer variety
attributes.description: Distinguishes between different types of coffee creamer, e.g. powder, non-dairy

attributes.name: Coffee product form
attributes.description: Specifies the type of coffee product, such as ground or beans

attributes.name: Coffee roast
attributes.description: Defines the roast level of coffee products, e.g. light, medium, dark

attributes.name: Coil connection
attributes.description: Defines the replaceability of the coil in vaping devices, e.g. fixed, changeable

attributes.name: Cooking method
attributes.description: Specifies the recommended cooking technique, e.g. grilling, frying

attributes.name: Cooking wine variety
attributes.description: Distinguishes between different varieties of cooking wine, e.g. rice, sherry

attributes.name: Cuisine
attributes.description: Classifies products by culinary style or region, e.g. Southwestern United States, Mediterranean

attributes.name: Dry bean variety
attributes.description: Identifies the variety of dry beans used, e.g. chickpeas, black beans

attributes.name: E-cigarette/Vaporizer style
attributes.description: Classifies e-cigarettes and vaporizers by their form factor, e.g. disposable, pen

attributes.name: E-liquid flavor
attributes.description: Specifies the taste of e-liquids for vaporizers and electronic cigarettes, e.g. coffee, strawberry

attributes.name: E-liquid variety
attributes.description: Distinguishes between different e-liquid options, e.g. short fill, nicotine shot

attributes.name: Fat content
attributes.description: Specifies the amount of fat in food and beverage products, e.g. full fat, low fat

attributes.name: Food product form
attributes.description: Specifies the form in which the food product is presented, such as dried or frozen

attributes.name: Fruit source
attributes.description: Identifies whether fruit in drinks is from concentrate or not

attributes.name: Gel strength
attributes.description: Indicates gel or bloom strength of gelatin products, e.g. high bloom, low bloom

attributes.name: Gin variety
attributes.description: Classifies gin products by their specific type, e.g. flavored, London dry

attributes.name: Grind size
attributes.description: Indicates the coarseness or fineness of coffee grounds, such as extra coarse or fine

attributes.name: Hard cider variety
attributes.description: Specifies the flavor profile of hard cider, e.g. sharp, sweet

attributes.name: Heat level
attributes.description: Indicates the spiciness of food and beverage products, such as mild or very hot

attributes.name: Heating instructions
attributes.description: Specifies how to properly heat the product, e.g. oven, stovetop

attributes.name: Liqueur variety
attributes.description: Classifies liqueurs by their primary flavor profiles, e.g. nut, cream

attributes.name: Meat cut
attributes.description: Helps identify the specific cut or style of meat, e.g. burger, wings

attributes.name: Meat type
attributes.description: Identifies the source of meat items, e.g. plant-based, chicken

attributes.name: Nut butter variety
attributes.description: Identifies the nut variety in nut-based spreads, e.g. peanut, almond

attributes.name: Nut processing method
attributes.description: Defines how nuts or seeds are prepared, e.g. candied, raw

attributes.name: Nut/Seed type
attributes.description: Identifies the specific type of nut or seed in a product, such as almonds or chia seeds

attributes.name: Pasta type
attributes.description: Classifies pasta products by their specific shape or form, e.g. macaroni, penne

attributes.name: Pipe shape
attributes.description: Defines the form of smoking pipes, e.g. gourd, billiard

attributes.name: Rum grade
attributes.description: Classifies rum based on characteristics or grade, e.g. premium, spiced

attributes.name: Seafood type
attributes.description: Classifies seafood products by species, such as tuna or lobster

attributes.name: Soda variety
attributes.description: Classifies soda products by type or flavor, e.g. lemon lime, orange

attributes.name: Spirit dilution
attributes.description: Indicates the concentration level of alcoholic spirits, e.g. diluted, undiluted

attributes.name: Tea input type
attributes.description: Specifies the preparation style of tea, e.g. bags, K-cups

attributes.name: Tequila variety
attributes.description: Specifies the type of tequila, e.g. gold, aged

attributes.name: Tobacco type
attributes.description: Specifies the variety of tobacco, e.g. Turkish, Virginia

attributes.name: VG/PG ratio
attributes.description: Indicates the vegetable glycerin to propylene glycol ratio in e-liquids, e.g. 30:70

attributes.name: Vaping style
attributes.description: Specifies the vaping technique for electronic cigarettes, e.g. direct-to-lung, mouth-to-lung

attributes.name: Vinegar drink variety
attributes.description: Specifies the type of vinegar-based beverage, e.g. kombucha, shrub

attributes.name: Vinegar variety
attributes.description: Distinguishes between different kinds of vinegar, e.g. fruit, balsamic

attributes.name: Whiskey style
attributes.description: Defines the specific type of whiskey, e.g. single malt, blended malt

attributes.name: Whiskey variety
attributes.description: Classifies whiskey based on grain type or style, e.g. corn, rye

attributes.name: Wine variety
attributes.description: Helps distinguish between different kinds of wines, e.g. white, rosé
